I'm Gerrit, a Full-Stack Designer and Frontend Developer from Germany. Driven by passion for modern design & tech I take care of design systems & clean code for companies and startups.

gerrit@gerrithalfmann.com

Selected clients and projects

Camino Network
Camino is the travel industry blockchain. Fueled by the Camino token, it is offering a versatile platform to expand current business models and to create new touristic products to delight travelers and business partners.
Branding  /   Design System  /   Website  /   https://camino.network ->
Chain4Travel
Chain4Travel is the facilitator of the Camino consortium blockchain, a new disruptive approach to trade touristic products B2B, B2C and D2C with over 120 supporters from the travel industry.
Branding  /   Design  /   Website  /   https://chain4travel.com ->
Qizify Learning
An online learning platform that empowers your students to learn by creating and solving quizzes related to their study program while tracking performance.
Branding  /   Design  /   Website  /   https://qizify.com/en ->
Majesticons Icons
Majestic looking iconset with 720 free MIT License icons in two styles. Carefully crafted with and for Figma. Change stroke-width, corner radius and colors easily.
Personal  /   Icons  /   Design  /   https://www.majesticons.com ->
Nutritional consultant
You may only need professional nutritional advice once in your life - but you can benefit from it for the rest of your life. Ute Becker is happy to accompany and support you on your way to a healthy diet.
Branding  /   Design  /   Development  /   Hosting  /   https://qizify.com/en ->
Pixelarticons
480 open-source line pixel-art style icons, in one color and made with a 24x24px grid by Gerrit Halfmann . Pro version with 1,422 icons with 3 variants!
